events.message: I received the wrong size shirt and would like to request a refund since it does not fit and I don't want to exchange.
The case was reviewed and categorized as a Refund request based on the customer's message about wanting money back.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect shirt size.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the shirt you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 45789123. I have attached a photo showing the shirt size tag and the packaging it came in.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate the help and am satisfied with the solution.
The refund issue has been resolved with confirmation of the refund process started and completion expected soon.
We wanted to check in and make sure you received your refund as expected and if there is anything more we can assist with.
Since the refund has been received and no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
